channel.title: [317] how to make an area ALL pvp [317]
channel.description:
ok, so i was wondering if any1 knew how to make everywhere PK except, the banks in evercity, ALSO all of lumbridge castle..i want everything but those locations player verses players..is it possible? please post if you have any idea on how to make this, or if you know of any tut about this :D
EDIT: yeah i [b]USED GOOGLE.COM[/b] and YEAH i used [b]THE SEARCH BAR!!!!!!!@#!@[/b]
just someone please help this would help me a lot :D! thanks!
~ShErMaN~

item.title: [317] how to make an area ALL pvp [317]
item.dc:creator: @Pulmonary Pulmonary
item.description:
@Pulmonary wrote:

Depending on the source you have, if your source is the one where you can make safezones, then just find that, delete all the locations, and make the banks safezones only.

Read full topic
item.source: [317] how to make an area ALL pvp [317]
